title: How can we use characters for setting ideas? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is a character setting questionnaire: What kind of home and neighbourhood did you imagine for your character?What are some of the items in your character's refrigerator?What's on your character’s bookshelves?Is there anything under your character's bed?What's in your character's night table drawer?Where has your character lived in the past? what kind of environment do you think your character grew up in?What are your character's cultural roots?What kind of school did your character attend?Did your character ever go to summer camp?What is your character's workplace like?If your character is married, where do his or her in-laws live? What is their home like?These are the basic questions you could use to get a setting idea, you should add questions according to your ‘plot‘
